statements: SELECT * FROM product_inventory WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, online_store_quantity FROM product_inventory WHERE physical_store_quantity > 0;
SELECT product_name, physical_store_quantity FROM product_inventory WHERE online_store_quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM product_inventory ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM product_inventory WHERE online_store_quantity < physical_store_quantity;
SELECT product_name, online_store_quantity, physical_store_quantity FROM product_inventory WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM product_inventory WHERE online_store_quantity > 10 ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT product_name, physical_store_quantity FROM product_inventory WHERE online_store_quantity < 5 LIMIT 3;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM product_inventory WHERE physical_store_quantity > online_store_quantity;
SELECT product_name, last_updated FROM product_inventory WHERE physical_store_quantity < 3 AND online_store_quantity > 0 ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT * FROM online_store_inventory
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM physical_store_inventory
SELECT product_name, physical_price FROM online_store_inventory
SELECT * FROM physical_store_inventory WHERE physical_quantity > 50
SELECT product_id, online_price FROM online_store_inventory ORDER BY online_price DESC
SELECT * FROM online_store_inventory WHERE online_quantity > 100 ORDER BY online_price DESC;
SELECT product_name, physical_quantity, physical_price FROM physical_store_inventory WHERE physical_quantity <= 50;
SELECT product_name, online_quantity, online_price FROM online_store_inventory WHERE online_price BETWEEN 50.00 AND 100.00;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM online_store_inventory WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%' OR product_name LIKE '%B';
SELECT * FROM online_store_inventory WHERE online_price > 50.00 AND online_quantity < 200 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM product_details WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, price FROM product_details WHERE manufacturer = 'Apple';
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM online_store_inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM online_store_inventory WHERE store_location = 'New York' AND quantity > 10;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM product_details WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM online_store_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, store_location FROM physical_store_inventory WHERE store_location = 'New York';
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM product_details WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM online_store_inventory WHERE store_location = 'Los Angeles' AND quantity < 5;
SELECT product_name, store_location FROM physical_store_inventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 20 ORDER BY store_location ASC;
SELECT * FROM online_stores;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT store_id, product_id, stock_level FROM physical_stores ORDER BY stock_level DESC;
SELECT product_id, store_id, timestamp FROM stock_history WHERE store_id = 2 AND stock_level > 50 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT store_id, COUNT(product_id) AS num_products FROM physical_stores GROUP BY store_id HAVING num_products > 3;
SELECT store_id, product_id, stock_level FROM online_stores;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products ORDER BY product_name;
SELECT product_id, AVG(stock_level) AS avg_stock FROM stock_history GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT store_id, SUM(stock_level) AS total_stock FROM physical_stores GROUP BY store_id HAVING total_stock > 100;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM Products;
SELECT product_name, category FROM Products;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT store_id, store_name, location FROM PhysicalStores;
SELECT store_id, product_id, stock_level FROM OnlineStoresInventory;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT store_name, location FROM OnlineStores WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT product_name, category FROM Products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT store_name, location FROM PhysicalStores WHERE store_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM OnlineStoresInventory INNER JOIN Products ON OnlineStoresInventory.product_id = Products.product_id WHERE stock_level > 50;
